description: A thumbs up or a thumbs down facemark is another easy action to make. Get a Japanese emoticon to give a thumbs up by adding a b or a d to a happy looking face. You can make thumbs down emoticons by adding Ps to unhappy looking ones. That’s all there is to it!   d(-_^) (*＾-‘) 乃 (*^▽^*)b (*＾▽＾)b d(´∀`)b d(ﾟ∀ﾟ )b d(･∀･○) d(^～^) (n˘v˘•)b (　^ω^）b d (^‿^✿) (。≖ˇｪˇ≖｡)b (｡^U^)b (*-凵-)b s( ^ ‿ ^)-b s( ^ ‸ ^)-p
title: Thumbs Up or Down
